price: 39. Bet Firaun (Faraonas) nusisuko (nuo tikėjimo) su savo pavaldiniais, sakydamas apie Mūsą (Mozę): „Magas arba beprotis!“
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
